name: Euclid Talk Lester
_source: # huge momentum shift for the map
s;Lester;Euclid! What are you doing here?{w}{br}Can't you see we're under attack?
s;Euclid;Yes, and we're here to help.
s;Euclid;And Lester, it looks like you're hurt. You should fall back.
s;Lester;I can't run while these barbarians attempt to destroy Pelopos.
s;Euclid;Trust us to fight them off here. You can support us from afar.

s;Lester;Argh. You're right, of course. My magic isn't exactly... well equipped for the front lines.{w}{br}But you might just be what we need.{w}{br}The other Senate guards fled from the onslaught, but they may be emboldened by your support.
s;Lester;GUARDS! REINFORCEMENTS HAVE ARRIVED!{w}{br}DON'T JUST COWER IN FEAR WHILE YOUR CITY FALLS!{w}{br}GET OUT HERE AND FIGHT!{w} NOW!
s;Lester;They will see reason and support us. {w}{br}We will turn the tides and stop this intrusion!
s;Lester;While only a scholar, you've proven your bravery more than the cravens guarding this place.{w}{br}May this guide you to victory.
s;Lester;We will win this battle yet...
